cs.ualberta.ca.beargitandroid.ES

Class ESClient

  • java.lang.Object
    • cs.ualberta.ca.beargitandroid.ES.ESClient

  • public class ESClient
extends java.lang.Object
    This is the Elastic Search Client Class. This class is responsible for communicating with WebServer. This class can be used to insert, delete, modify, and search stories on the WebServer. This code has been taken and modified from: https://github.com/rayzhangcl/ESDemo
    Author:
    Chenlei Zhang - Original Owner, Minhal Syed - Modified Original Code

    • Method Detail

      • insertStory

        public void insertStory(Story story)
                 throws java.io.IOException
        This function stores a story on the WebServer based on the story's ID. If a new story with the same Id is inserted, the previous one is overwritten. Consumes the POST/Insert operation of the service
        Throws:
        java.io.IOException
        java.lang.IllegalStateException

      • getStory

        public Story getStory(java.lang.String StoryID)
        Consumes the Get operation of the service Given a StoryId, It returns a StoryObject from The Server.
        Parameters:
        StoryID -
        Returns:
        Story -- Returns Null if no Story Found

      • getAllStories

        public java.util.ArrayList<Story> getAllStories()
        This function returns all the stories on the server, as an ArrayList of Stories.
        Returns:
        allStories

      • searchStories

        public java.util.ArrayList<Story> searchStories(java.lang.String Keyword)
        search by keywords

      • deleteURI

        public void deleteURI(java.lang.String URI)

      • deleteStory

        public void deleteStory(Story story)
        Delete a Story Object from WebServer. A story is deleted based on its storyId.
